Package EClass.Presentation.LayerObject

Package LayerObject defines objects and operations related to the various objects that are drawn or placed on a layer.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Circle
    Circle is a LayerObject representing the geometric shape circle.
    Color
    A Color object represents a hue.
    FreeLine
    The FreeLine will represent a combination of Points to be presented onto the screen.
    Image
    The Image is a LayerObject for a layer.
    ImagePoint
    The ImagePoint is a specific kind of point that contains color.
    LayerObject
    LayerObject is a graphical object to be drawn on a Layer.
    Oval
    Oval is a LayerObject representing the geomtric shape oval.
    Point
    The Point class is used to represent any individual point in a layer.
    Rectangle
    Rectangle is a LayerObject representing the geometric shape rectangle.
    Square
    Square is a LayerObject representing the gemoetric shape square.
    StraightLine
    A StraightLine object represents a mark or band between two points.
    TextBox
    The TextBox can be used to represent any text the user wishes to present on to a layer.
    Triangle
    The Triangle is geometric shape for a Layer object.

Package EClass.Presentation.LayerObject Description

Package LayerObject defines objects and operations related to the various objects that are drawn or placed on a layer.
